synopsis.text: Not your typical high school experience, Kaihei finds himself thrust into the role of chairperson at St. Luminous Mission High School, an all-girls private religious institution, following the passing of his grandfather. As the sole male student and unexpected leader, Kaihei is tasked with overseeing school affairs and enforcing rules. Upon his arrival, alongside his trusted friend, they are confronted with a perplexing mystery: the inexplicable disappearance of a student. Determined to solve this enigma without involving local law enforcement, Kaihei embarks on a thrilling journey to unravel the secrets of the school and its past before time runs out. As he delves deeper into the investigation, a startling revelation emerges â€“ the missing girl, Melina Sukavysih, was seen by Kaihei just hours earlier in the nearby forest. Will Kaihei and his friends uncover the truth behind these strange occurrences before graduation day?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
